plugin.name: ðŸ“… Date Automations
plugin.description: Helping you move faster with dates
plugin.author: David Wertheimer, with help from code by @nmn

plugin.commands.name: ldn
plugin.commands.description: Create link to today's Calendar Note at cursor

plugin.commands.name: iso
plugin.commands.description: Insert date+time (in ISO format) at cursor

plugin.commands.name: dp
plugin.commands.description: (Date Picker) Choose format and insert date/time time at cursor

plugin.settings.title: Date Locale
plugin.settings.description: Geographic date locale for date/time formatting. e.g. en-US, en-GB, etc. e.g. en-US will result in mm/dd/yyyy, while en_GB will be dd/mm/yyyy. See https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/datacap/9.1.8?topic=support-supported-language-codes for a list of available locales.

plugin.settings.title: Custom Time String Format
plugin.settings.description: Used in /formatted command. See https://www.strfti.me/ for details on the formatting codes

plugin.settings.title: Custom Time String Format
plugin.settings.description: can force 24 hour time format, even in america!

plugin.settings.title: Use 12 hour format
plugin.settings.description: You can force 24 hour time format, even in America!
